com.facebook.buck.core.test.rule

Interface TestXRule

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AllowsNonAnnotatedFields, BuildEngineAction, BuildRule, Comparable<BuildRule>, ExternalTestRunnerRule, HasSupplementaryOutputs, TestRule
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GoTestX, JavaTestX, PythonTestX, RobolectricTestX

    public interface TestXRule
extends TestRule, ExternalTestRunnerRule, HasSupplementaryOutputs
    Marks a rule as implementing the test protocol

      • runTestSeparately

        @Deprecated
default boolean runTestSeparately()
        Deprecated. 
        tests are not ran by Buck. This attribute should be on the test specs for the test runner to interpret
        Specified by:
        runTestSeparately in interface TestRule
        Returns:
        true if the test should run by itself when no other tests are run, false otherwise.

      • supportsStreamingTests

        @Deprecated
default boolean supportsStreamingTests()
        Deprecated. 
        tests are not ran by Buck. This attribute should be on the test specs for the test runner to interpret
        Specified by:
        supportsStreamingTests in interface TestRule
        Returns:
        true if calling runTests() on this rule invokes the callbacks in testReportingCallback as the tests run, false otherwise.

      • getExternalTestRunnerSpec

        default ExternalTestSpec getExternalTestRunnerSpec(ExecutionContext executionContext,
                                                   TestRunningOptions testRunningOptions,
                                                   BuildContext buildContext)
        This shouldn't be overriden as the default implementation is sufficient. Unfortunately it's not trivial to convert this to an Abstract class and make this final because rules also extend a variety of AbstractBuildRule classes and multiple inheritance is not available in Java.
        Specified by:
        getExternalTestRunnerSpec in interface ExternalTestRunnerRule
        Returns:
        the test protocol specs.

      • onPreTest

        @Deprecated
default void onPreTest(BuildContext buildContext)
        Deprecated. 
        since Buck doesn't actually run the test, pre test steps make no sense.
        Specified by:
        onPreTest in interface ExternalTestRunnerRule
